column4: Hiya people, I got a tecra 8100 laptop, with a USB cable modem, is there any way to get ubuntu to recognise this as an ethernet connection (such as fedora does etc)?
Ubuntu doesn't care about the modem, enless its internal, and I've not heard of that
wait... gah... but hotplug should recognize it... any reason you aren't using a NIC? its a lot faster  :/
